sense.def:
A harangue
je dolg, ognjevit, prepričljiv govor.

seg.quote: ...blazing harangues about the wickedness of the Government.

sense.def:
To harangue someone
pomeni zelo se truditi, da bi nekoga prepričali, naj sprejme naše mnenje ali zamisli.

seg.quote: Smith harangued his fellow students and persuaded them to walk out.
